column4: maxkelly, when i ran the nvidia-glx-config enable, to turn on the driver, i get: Error: your X configuration has been altered.
ok, thanks.  should it be nvidia or nvidia-legacy
it a riva tnt2, so it should be legacy, i looked into that
jack, im an ati guy myself, but this is an older commercial box tha i havnt upgraded yet
riva tnt2 128, jack.  yes i looked at the documentation and it said legacy, so ill go with that
to restart x, it would be sudo startx, right?
